tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE expression_values (
  expression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id INT,
  expression_value FLOAT,
  sample_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES genes(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_results (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  gene_id INT,
  experiment_type VARCHAR(255),
  result FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_metadata(sample_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES gene_expression(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE genes (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  gene_sequence TEXT,
  chromosome_number INT,
  start_position INT,
  end_position INT,
  gene_function TEXT)

CREATE TABLE samples (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50),
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  sample_description TEXT,
  organism_name VARCHAR(50),
  gene_id INT REFERENCES genes(gene_id))

CREATE TABLE experiments (experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(50),
  experiment_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  sample_id INT REFERENCES samples(sample_id),
  analysis_result TEXT)

CREATE TABLE results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id),
  result_type VARCHAR(50),
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Sample (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_name VARCHAR(255), tissue_type VARCHAR(255), experiment_date DATE)
